blogs.title: Gentleman in extreme wildfire danger zone didn't feel like mowing his lawn, so he torched it instead
blogs.body: A gentleman near Langdale, British Columbia wasn't in the mood to mow the tall grass on his lawn so he torched it instead. Worth noting is that there is 'extreme' danger of wildfires in the area and burn bans are in place. Firefighters extinguished the blaze. From CTV News: Mounties said the homeowner told them…
blogs.author: mario

blogs.title: Couple dug up and buried dozens of iconic and protected Joshua Trees
blogs.body: Jeffrey Walter and Jonetta Nordberg-Walter are in trouble for digging up and burying three dozen Joshua trees, the iconic and protected plant native to the Southwestern United States. It's illegal to 'disturb, move, replant, remove or kill' Western Joshua Trees. The couple uprooted the trees on their property—just a few miles from Joshua Tree National…
blogs.author: adnan
